archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Party Privacy Management Definition
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Define the Privacy Management that applies to the category of Data Subject Party (i.e. a ProfileType of a PartyRole)

properties.value: The Party Privacy Management Definition processes manage the definition of the Privacy Management that applies to a particular category of Data Subject Party. It is used to determine the legal elements the Data Controller Party wants to apply and use, such as jurisdiction, location, Regulation, and standards.
